data.text:
@AB1327 @AndrewHayen And now he's starting to block lots of people. I've even seen some of the UK Covid people who are quite centrist saying they're getting blocked by him now or they're blocked but didn't even know who he is.

So he's going to get more extreme due to more limited interactions.
@lukristofer @Biggus_footus @AndrewHayen It explains the big following among the covidzero and OzSage type lunatics who are also not very bright and also despise the human race.
@AndrewHayen Waiting for the next take about how Russia and China show the old West's collective spirit about infectious diseases before being corrupted by evil libertarianism

@discoball2000 @AndrewHayen I’m not sure that Ukraine’s desires much inform Russia’s thinking though. The attitudes & concerns of western powers very much does though. Our friend only needs listen to Putin’s televised speech last week to understand it all.
@tradrmum @AndrewHayen Ukraine wants to move more in the direction of the west and is fighting to self determine that future - kinda refutes his theory.
@AndrewHayen I think he means that our government should put out false case and death data, and let the worriers live in ignorant bliss rather than make peace with reality
@AndrewHayen It's clearly a statistical construct Andrew
@AndrewHayen Nutjob tankies. They need to be called out.
